title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4122.31 - Report if no totalisator
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4122.31 - Report if no totalisator

State Regulations

The licensed harness racing association, if operating a
mutuel system without the totalizator, shall, in taking off total of mutuel
ticket sales, prepare an additional copy is at the same time of making and
furnish the same to the representative of the commission and the State Tax

Commission before the calculations for mutuel prices to be paid are
made. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4122.31

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
